data.quote: If something stands between you and your success, move it. Never be denied.
data.author: Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson, professional wrestler and actor

data.quote: You dream. You plan. You reach. There will be obstacles. There will be doubters. There will be mistakes. But with hard work, with belief, with confidence and trust in yourself and those around you, there are no limits.
data.author: Michael Phelps, swimmer and Olympic gold medalist

data.quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Bodybuilding is an art, your body is the canvas, weights are your brush and nutrition is your paint. We all have the ability to turn a self-portrait into a masterpiece.
data.author: Kai Greene

data.quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
data.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

data.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, ”Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
data.author: Mahummad Ali

data.quote: When one person hesitates because he feels inferior, the other is busy making mistakes and becoming superior
data.author: Henry C Link

data.quote: The mind always fails first, not the body. The secret is to make your mind work for you, not against you.
data.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

data.quote: Go hard or go home
data.author: Phil Heath

data.quote: Blood, Sweat and Respect. First Two You Give, Last One You Earn
data.author: Dwayne Johnson | The Rock

data.quote: Let Actions Do Your Talkin For You, (Unless Your Telling A Good Dirty Joke)
data.author: Dwayne Johnson | The Rock

data.quote: Stay hungry, stay foolish
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Always forgive your enemies - nothing annoys them so much.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. In order to maintain balance, you must keep moving.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.
data.author: Warren Buffett

data.quote: The most important investment you can make is in yourself.
data.author: Warren Buffett

data.quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: He who conquers others is strong, he who conquers himself is mighty.
data.author: Lao Tsu

data.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
data.author: Mae West

data.quote: Don’t complain about what you don’t have. Use what you’ve got. To be less than your best is a sin.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey
